name: concrete production, 25MPa, for building construction, with cement, CEM II/B-V | concrete, 25MPa | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/25847/documentation

This dataset represents the production of South African 25 MPa ready-mix concrete. Density: 2,270 kg/m³. The composition of concrete (for 1 m³) contains: Portland fly ash cement 270 kg, Water 126 kg, Gravel 1050 kg, Sand 950kg, Admixtures (air-entrainers and superplastisizers) 2.48 kg. [The amount of ingredients indicated here do not include the production waste amount of 24.5kg per 1m3 of concrete adopted from "concrete production, 25MPa, RNA only, GLO 2006" dataset [accessed on 2017/12/14 ]. The production waste volume is proportionally shared between the inputs: cement, sand and gravel. The adjusted input values are indicated in the exchange section. In addition, the amount of water included here refers to the batch water. Non-process water is adopted from "concrete production, 25MPa, RNA only, GLO 2006" dataset [accessed on 2017/12/14 ]] 25 MPa concrete is moderate strength concrete and is suitable for reinforced foundations, and slabs, light-duty house floors, paths, patios, steps, driveways and garage floors. Annual production volume of Ready-Mix concrete for South Africa is published in www.statssa.gov.za. Distribution by Ready-Mix concrete for South Africa is estimated based on a sample of 1% of ready-mix producers in SA. Distribution by ready-mix strength class is estimate as: • 15MPa = 3.6% 20 MPa = 4 % • 25 MPa = 32 % • 30 MPa = 49% • 35 MPa = 4 % • 40 MPa = 6 % • 45 MPa = 0.1 % • 50 MPa = 1.3%

From reception of raw materials at the ready-mix plant gate.

This activity ends with the input of concrete in the mixing truck. The dataset includes the whole manufacturing processes to produce ready-mixed concrete, internal processes (material handling and mixing) and infrastructure. The dataset does not include the transportation of concrete in the mixing truck. An average of 4.64 litres of diesel is used on average transportation of 1m3 concrete.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: South African data. For some exchanges RER-modules have been used as proxy. Data quality indicators adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Typical technology for South Africa production.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This activity represents South Africa ready mix concrete production, Some of the data were taken from the "concrete production 25MPa, RNA only, GLO 2006" dataset [Accessed on 2017/12/14]. Whereas some of the values were calculated based on primary data collection in South Africa. The concrete constituents (cement, gravel, and sand), the electricity consumption and the acetic acid (superplasticizer) consumption were calculated based on primary data collection in South Africa.The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The data presented in this dataset is representative of ready-mix producers who represent 35% of the concrete production market in ZA.
